name: Fish (Ducky and Co.)
description:
There once was a fish... 

His name was Kenny.

He was about to go on an adventure, but something lurked in the distance. It's small for now. The more Kenny collects, the more it grows. But what is it?

Hi friends! *waves*

Thanks for checking out my game. This is for the Kenney Game Jam. It was made in under 48 hours! It is more of an interactive story, but I hope to expand it when there is no time limit. :) 

All art is from Kenney • Free game assets

I used:

*Fish Pack

*Font Package

*Rune Pack

*Particle Pack
